name: KnittingBoss
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: knitting boss
des: Let Alexa generate a simple 4 stitch pattern repeat for each round of you project. This can easily be used for socks, hats, or scarves with stitch counts in multiples of 4. Create a totally unique item!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
